General.Name: Måsøval AS
General.Description: Måsøval AS, an aquaculture company, produces and sells salmon in Norway and internationally. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Frøya, Norway. Måsøval AS operates as a subsidiary of Måsøval Eiendom AS.

7.Name: Mr. Andreas  Skagoy
7.Title: Head of Fish Health & Area Mang. PA5

8.Name: Mr. Eldar Arne Henden
8.Title: CEO & Part Owner of Pure Norwegian Seafood AS
